message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I'll take the lead, Alice. You can't negotiate a better deal than this!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it closer to even this time.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm taking control now!
Okay, Bob. Let's try to meet in the middle. I'll take a slightly smaller share this time, but we need to reach an agreement.
You're getting close to desperation, Alice. I'm not budging, but I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time.
Bob, I'm willing to accept a smaller share, but we need to come to an agreement soon. The money is losing value fast, and we're both losing out.
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking the last chance to make a deal, but I'm not backing down.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is my final offer. If we don't agree, we'll both lose everything.
